control.name: treeListLookUpEdit1
control.description: The TreeListLookUpEdit control provides lookup functionality using a dropdown XtraTreeList control.

control.name: treeList1
control.description: The Owner column uses a TreeListLookUpEdit control as an in-place editor.

control.name: icbTextEditStyle
control.description: Specifies the style in which text is displayed and edited in the editor.

control.name: ceAutoComplete
control.description: In auto completion mode, the text in the edit box is automatically completed if it matches a DisplayMember field value of one of the dropdown rows.

control.name: ceImmediatePopup
control.description: Specifies whether the popup window is displayed immediately after an end-user has typed a character in the edit box.

control.name: cePopupSizeable
control.description: Specifies whether the popup window is sizable.

control.name: ceShowPopupFooter
control.description: Specifies whether the dropdown window's footer is visible.

control.name: ceShowAutoFilterRow
control.description: Specifies whether the auto filter row is displayed.

control.name: ceShowColumnHeaders
control.description: Specifies whether column headers are displayed.

control.name: ceShowIndicator
control.description: Specifies whether the row indicator panel is displayed.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceEvenRow
control.description: Specifies whether the even rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the TreeListAppearanceCollection.EvenRow property.

control.name: ceEnableAppearanceOddRow
control.description: Specifies whether the odd rows are painted using the appearance settings provided by the TreeListAppearanceCollection.OddRow property.
